LEAST FAV TRACK: PORCELANA

ROSALÍA - LUX / 2025 / COLUMBIA / ART POP, ORCHESTRAL, FLAMENCO, OPERA

7/10

Y'all know this is just my opinion, right?
title: ROSALÍA - LUX ALBUM REVIEW
